reviewText:
Solid and we'll done, in both conception and execution.  Thoughtful simple story exceeding expectation in achieving anot enjoyable and even delightful little distraction of entertaining mystery and exploration of the muddled nest of human affairs.
Personally, I appreciate the option of many-language (polyglottal?) subtitles that don't make the American me feel like a duck in a shooting gallery while really being a fish in a barrel.
